title: trying to leave a team that is not active
body:
So i was invited to a team and after a few months now , the team is no longer active . I get the chat pop ups every time i log in . how do i leave the inactive team ? 
you can shoot me an e-mail at --snip-- or I will try to find this post.  

I saw another post from 2011 that says there is supposed to be a tab to click on but, I haven't been able to locate the tab or anyway to leave the team .  I was hoping there was a command like /leave team or something like that that i can type in the chat box. 

Thanks a million . 

Daniel

replies.body: It's not a good idea to share your email address through a public venue, so I snipped it out for your privacy.  Looking into the account you are posting from, I was unable to find any ranked teams.  If you're still having an issue let me know the summoner name and team name, and I can try and help out.  Otherwise, everything looks okay!
